ap1EndDate.description: End date of the first accounting period that a company can apportion a disallowance to.

ap2EndDate.description: End date of the second accounting period that a company can apportion a disallowance to.

ap3EndDate.description: End date of the third accounting period that a company can apportion a disallowance to.

disallowanceAp1.description: Amount of disallowance for the first accounting period

disallowanceAp2.description: Amount of disallowance for the second accounting period

disallowanceAp3.description: Amount of disallowance for the third accounting period

totalDisallowances.description: Total disallowances for all accounting periods
